Diagnostic criteria for Devic’s Optic neuritis, myelitis, and ≥2 out of 3 of: •MRI 
evidence of a continuous cord lesion for ≥3 segments. •Brain MRI at onset non-
diagnostic for MS. •NMO-IgG (anti-AQP4) serum or CSF positivity (poorer prognosis).
NB: CNS involvement beyond the optic nerves and cord is compatible with NMO.
